subprocess_flow.description: The designated Inventory Management Team member receives the Root Cause Analysis Report to understand the reason for the stock-out.
success_criteria: Designated team member has received the Root Cause Analysis Report.

subprocess_flow.description: The designated team member evaluates the available options for immediate action based on the root cause and current inventory levels.
success_criteria: Possible immediate actions have been identified and assessed.

subprocess_flow.description: The team member checks the back stock for any additional inventory of the stocked-out product.
success_criteria: Back stock has been thoroughly checked for the product.

subprocess_flow.description: If back stock is unavailable, the team member contacts other store locations to inquire about inventory transfer possibilities.
success_criteria: Other store locations have been contacted regarding inventory transfer.

subprocess_flow.description: If inventory transfer is not possible, the team member contacts the supplier to expedite the next order of the stocked-out product.
success_criteria: Supplier has been contacted to expedite the next order.

subprocess_flow.description: The team member communicates the actions taken to sales associates and provides them with alternative product suggestions to offer to customers.
success_criteria: Sales associates are informed of the situation and provided with alternative product suggestions.

subprocess_flow.description: The team member documents all actions taken to address the stock-out, including the outcome of each action.
success_criteria: All actions taken have been documented.
